name: p110 - Jimpy-G
notes:
"Why the generated weapon doesn't match the example in the Field Catalogue

- The manifest in the book has the base capacity as 40 for a light support receiver with battle rifle calibre but I think it should be 50, a base of 50 for the light support receiver (p31) minus 20% for battle rifle calibre (p37).
- The manifest in the book has a 25% Range increase for a Long barrel but the rules say it should be a 10% increase (p42)
- The manifest in the book doesn't have the x2 barrel cost multiplier for a heavy barrel (p43). It does have the weight multiplier. This also has the knock on effect of making the magazine cost in the table incorrect as the cost of a standard magazine is 1% of the weapon purchase price (p45)
- The manifest in the book doesn't have the Quickdraw -1 modifier for a heavy barrel (p43)
- The manifest in the book has a Quickdraw -2 modifier for a bipod accessory but the rules say it's -4 if the weapon isn't already on target (p43)
- The manifest in the book has Quickdraw -2 for the bipod accessory but the rules (p43) say it should be -4 and only when the weapon is no already on target. As the modifier doesn't apply in all circumstances Auto-Jimmy shows it in the notes section with details of when it's applied rather than include it in the weapons standard Quickdraw score.

"
